Motivation

  • Provide final GUI
  • Group one or more GUI element
  • Seal the business logic in one place
  • Easy to group : Slot
  • Easy to combine : MsgBus & UeEvent
  • Esay to customize : options
  • Esay to seal : Behavior & Tmpl
